mapper.insert: INSERT INTO makemate_image(uuid, original_name, saved_name, file_path, file_size, makemate_idx) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{originalName}, #{savedName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{makemateIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT uuid, original_name, saved_name, file_path, file_size, makemate_idx FROM makemate_image WHERE makemate_idx=#{makemateIdx}
